title: “Whats New” won't compile in Sphinx
body:
Getting the following lovely error log:
```
$ make html
Running Sphinx v2.4.5
loading translations [en]... done

<snip>
source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:16: WARNING: Unknown interpreted text role "pr".
source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:16: WARNING: Unknown interpreted text role "user".
<snip>
source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:16: WARNING: Undefined substitution referenced: "Maintenance".
source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:18: WARNING: Undefined substitution referenced: "Documentation".
source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:20: WARNING: Undefined substitution referenced: "Fix".
<snip>
/cephyr/users/joakiman/Alvis/kymatio/doc/source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:16: WARNING: Unknown interpreted text role "pr".
/cephyr/users/joakiman/Alvis/kymatio/doc/source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:16: WARNING: Unknown interpreted text role "user".
<snip>
/cephyr/users/joakiman/Alvis/kymatio/doc/source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:16: WARNING: Undefined substitution referenced: "Maintenance".
/cephyr/users/joakiman/Alvis/kymatio/doc/source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:18: WARNING: Undefined substitution referenced: "Documentation".
/cephyr/users/joakiman/Alvis/kymatio/doc/source/whats_new/v0.3.rst:20: WARNING: Undefined substitution referenced: "Fix".
<snip>
```

Looks like there's some sort of extension that could include these roles into Sphinx. I tried [this one](https://pypi.org/project/sphinx-github-role/) but it doesn't seem to be what we want. @eickenberg since you wrote this list, do you have some suggestion?
